Project Documentation

Overview

The WebLogic deployment plugin implements functionality to deploy and undeploy application in WebLogic domains.

The plugin is implemented as a wrapper around the Weblogic.deployer tool for weblogic 9.2. Information about the WebLogic.deployer tool can be found here.

Usage

Instructions on the usage of the plugin can be found here.

Examples

To provide you with better understanding on some usages of the plugin, you can take a look into the following examples:

  • How-to: Deploy a web application using the WebLogic deployment plugin.
  • How-to: Deploy a web application to multiple targets.
  • How-to: Deploy a web application using a deployment plan.

Development documentation

Technical documentation for developers about the architecture, design and implementation of the project can be found here.
